name: Skymid
overview:
Skymid is a hosted hotel management system targeted at small to medium businesses. it has different interfaces for different roles in the hotel. Front Desk Interface is for hotel administrator to do onetime changes such as room type and rate definition. frontdesk interface is for frontdesk operator to use it for hotels normal operation. in addition to that it has agent console for making reservations by third parties.

Skymid property management system has inbuilt pabx so it will make sure guest calls will be added to guests bill automatically. in addition to that it will give features like delivering guest name when making outgoing calls.

Intergrated wifi provides guest portal redirection to hotels portal and bill guests for the package that guest is selecting.
